Title: EU Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics
Description: The Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) was established by Eurostat in order to provide a single uniform breakdown of territorial units for the production of regional statistics for the European Union.

Title: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2
Description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 assigns two-letter codes to countries.

Title: GeoNames
Description: GeoNames assigns numerical identifiers to geographical names.

Title: OpenStreetMap node
Description: An OpenStreetMap node defines a point in space.

Title: OpenStreetMap way
Description: An OpenStreetMap way defines linear features and area boundaries, as an ordered list of nodes.

Title: OpenStreetMap relation
Description: An OpenStreetMap relation combines nodes, ways, and/or other relations.
